channel.title: Dialogue Errors
channel.description: Ok.. So its not an error via compiler, but an error in game. I put in the dialogues and then when I talk to the person it says "Line 1" for most of the dialogues. I'm using case numbers 100-178.

item.title: Dialogue Errors
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:2, topic:399416”]source?[/quote]Original Blank PI

[quote=“emtrescue, post:3, topic:399416”]migght have to do with how you set it up… if your using ints to change the text around u might need to change it a little nd make sure you have all the childs of the perant interface that you are using[/quote]I did the right layout:
case ###:
sendNpcChat#(“SHIT HERE”, c.talkingNpc, “NAME”);
c.nextChat = ##;
break;

But sometimes it shows “Line 1”. If anyone wunna help via TV that would be awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue Errors
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

migght have to do with how you set it up… if your using ints to change the text around u might need to change it a little nd make sure you have all the childs of the perant interface that you are using
